Rulings.Edison:
●If you have your opponent's card in your hand and activate Reload, your opponent's card is shuffled to his/her Deck.
●Your opponent can activate Appropriate in response to your drawing with Reload's effect.
Rulings.Tengu:
●If you have your opponent's card in your hand and activate Reload, your opponent's card is shuffled to his/her Deck.
●Your opponent can activate Appropriate in response to your drawing with Reload's effect.
Rulings.Goat:
●If you have your opponent's card in your hand and activate Reload, your opponent's card is shuffled to his/her Deck.
●Your opponent can activate Appropriate in response to your drawing with Reload's effect. If “Reload” is chained to the activation of “Drop Off,” the effect of “Drop Off” disappears.

Rulings.Base: 1. If you have your opponent's card in your hand and activate "Reload", your opponent's card is shuffled to his/her Deck.\n2. Your opponent can activate "Appropriate" in response to your drawing with the effect of "Reload".
